thread.section_title: Redspot Car Rentals Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Redspot Car Rentals | redspot.com.au | 2 of 707
thread.title: EVA
thread.title_full: Redspot Car Rentals reviewed by EVA

author: EVA
title: EVA
text: Had accidentally left my mobile in the car after leaving the keys and flew home. Only To find out that evening I was missing the mobile. I had quickly notified the airport office that evening, so by the next morining I received a call that my mobile was found in the car and that they were going to post it to me. I am so grateful for them to be so honest, as a pensioner it would have been very costly to replace. Again I wish a Thank You to the staff at Redspot.
